description: Try our easy to follow Orangey Baked Nectarines recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Orangey Baked Nectarines Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 firm ripe nectarines, halved and stoned
0.3 cup fat free Greek yoghurt with honey, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Put the liqueur, vanilla bean paste or extract, orange rind and honey in a bowl and stir until well combined.
Arrange the nectarines, cut-side up, in an ovenproof dish, then drizzle over the liqueur mixture. Bake in a preheated oven, 180°C, Gas Mark 4, for 18-20 minutes until tender.
Divide the nectarines between 2 serving bowls and serve with the yoghurt, drizzled with the pan juices.
